Translations.Text: My created human my zauzlit co he whispers himself. My bol koniec do him than jeho jugular vein
zapisnica (angels) do na pravo do vlavo constantly zapisnica
Nie utterance robi he utter alert svedok
Finally inevitable coma smrt pojdem; this bol co ona tried evade
Roh blown this bol promised dni
Kazdy soul pod s herder svedok
Ona pouzivat bol oblivious do this. My ihned zosadit tvoj zavoj; dnes tvoj vision je mat rad strong mat rad steel
companion said Tu bol moj formidable testimony
Throw into Gehenna kazdy zaryty disbeliever
Forbidder laska k bliznemu aggressor full z doubt
He set GOD iny god Throw him into severe retribution
Jeho companion said Our Lord ja nie zmylit him; he bol daleko astray
He said nie feud Mna; ja sufficiently warned ona
Nothing zmenit teraz. Ja bol never unjust towards ludia
